World Bank Sounds Alarm on Global Poverty and Slowing Growth | WION
Edited By
WION Video Desk
Published:
Jan 15, 2026, 10:51 IST
| Updated:
Jan 15, 2026, 10:51 IST
The World Bank has warned that a quarter of developing countries are now poorer than they were before the Covid pandemic. Many low income nations, especially in sub Saharan Africa, have endured a prolonged economic shock over the past six years, raising fresh concerns about stalled development and widening global inequality.
